Name: Breaking Lockdown
About the game: Challenging, gory, intense! Find your way through a hostile urban environment, avoid getting killed by authorities and prepare for anything, even corpses coming back to life! You probably should have stayed home, but it's too late for that... Key features: Die and retry mechanics A 30-60 minute experience that can be completed in one sitting A rich (but dangerous!), detailed environment for players who love exploration Secret endings, including a specific one for speed-runners! Interested? Don't forget to add the game to your wishlist: /
